INSERT INTO TB_CHAT_USER ( CHAT_ROOM_NUMBER, ESNTL_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, DELETE_AT ) VALUES ( #{categoryNo}, #{esntlId}, SYSDATE, #{loginEsntlId}, SYSDATE, #{loginEsntlId}, 'N' )
mapper.select:
/* CategoryChatMapper.getCategoryList */
SELECT A.CHAT_ROOM_TITLE, A.CHAT_ROOM_NUMBER FROM TB_CHAT_ROOM A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CHAT_USER B ON B.CHAT_ROOM_NUMBER = A.CHAT_ROOM_NUMBER WHERE B.ESNTL_ID = #{esntlId} AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND B.DELETE_AT = 'N'

/* CategoryChatMapper.getChatRoomName */
SELECT A.CHAT_ROOM_NUMBER, A.CHAT_ROOM_TITLE, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, B.NAME FROM TB_CHAT_ROOM A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON B.ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NUMBER = #{category}

/* CategoryChatMapper.getMemberListToInvite */
SELECT C.NAME, C.EMAIL, C.ESNTL_ID FROM TB_CHAT_ROOM A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PROJECT_USER B ON B.PROJECT_ID = A.PROJECT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER C ON C.ESNTL_ID = B.ESNTL_ID WHERE A.CHAT_ROOM_NUMBER = #{categoryNo} MINUS SELECT B.NAME, B.EMAIL, B.ESNTL_ID FROM TB_CHAT_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON B.ESNTL_ID = A.ESNTL_ID WHERE A.CHAT_ROOM_NUMBER = #{categoryNo}
mapper.update:
/* CategoryChatMapper.deleteChatRoom */
UPDATE TB_CHAT_ROOM SET DELETE_AT = 'Y', LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{loginEsntlId}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NUMBER = #{category}
